original: Lilljegren, Nils Hugo Hilding, civilingenjör SVR, Göteborg, f. 14/6/20 i Alingsås av Charles Hilding o. Mimmi Ingeborg L. G. 45 m. ing. Miriam Scharkowitzh. Barn: Leni f. 46. — Realex. 36, stud:ex. 39, utex. fr. CTH (VoV) 43, lic :studier. Förste assist, v. CTH inst. f. byggn:statik 43-44, ritkontorschef vid A-B Skånska Ce-mentgjuteriets Göteborgsavdelning 44-46, förste assist, i byggnadsteknik 46-47 samt assist, i mek. v. CTH sed. 45, egen konstr:firma sed. 46. Styr:-led. i Torrläggn. A-B i Sthlm sed. 46. Skr.: Ramberäkn. enligt successiva momentutjämn :metoden (kompend. v. CTH 44). Hobby: travsport. CTH John EricssonM.
translated: Lilljegren, Nils Hugo Hilding, Civil Engineer SVR, Gothenburg, b. June 14, 1920 in Alingsås to Charles Hilding and Mimmi Ingeborg L. G. Married to engineer Miriam Scharkowitzh. Children: Leni b. 1946. - Completed Realexamen in 1936, stud:examen in 1939, graduated from the Royal Institute of Technology (VoV) in 1943, pursued further studies. Worked as first assistant at the Royal Institute of Technology's Department of Building Statics from 1943-1944, chief of the drafting office at AB Skånska Cementgjuteriets Gothenburg division from 1944-1946, first assistant in building technology from 1946-1947, and assistant in mechanical engineering at the Royal Institute of Technology since 1945. Started own design firm in 1946. Serves on the board of Torrläggn. AB in Stockholm since 1946. Wrote: Ramberäkn. according to the progressive moment balancing method (a compendium from the Royal Institute of Technology, 1944). Hobby: harness racing. Married to CTH John EricssonM.

awards.name: Ramberäkn. according to the progressive moment balancing method
